If not, whether the Appellant being a non-resident company in Sri Lanka
carries on business through a permanent establishment in Sri Lanka by
virtue of the Article 5 of the DTAA between India and Sri Lanka;
If  so,  whether  the  Appellant,  comparatively  placed  with  a  resident

If not, whether the Appellant is entitled to exempt the amount of Rs.
